Hey ya! Someone off of the great great Exit Group and Dry Erase, whom we really loved last time they played at T|FF, will play at the exact same place today. Be there!

Saturday, May 26

Income tax refund and New Thing in Cartons present

GHILLIE SUIT (Oakland, US)
new electronic duo members of exit group & dry erase .
Spastic & analog noise synths with over hip-hop beats & pop jams. calculators.
first show - ONLY EUROPE SHOW


PURPUR SPYTT (CH | Le Syndicat de Scorpions)
No wave one-woman band with schizophrenic tendency. A bassline, a few guitar-ish harmonies, an eighties synth, a drum machine hidden in the loop pedals and two voices for the price of one.
https://lesyndicatdesscorpions.bandcamp.com/album/nitpick

Location: T|FF
Time: 9pm

May 26th, 2018 1:47pm
